entry.title: From Kabul to South Korea, Afghan Families Make a Hard Transition
entry.content: Nearly 400 Afghans try to acclimate to a very foreign and largely monoethnic South Korea that accepts few refugees after the Taliban uprooted their lives.

entry.title: U.S. Fights Information War With Russia to Deter Ukraine Invasion
entry.content: Russian troops are poised near Ukraineâ€™s borders and U.S. officials warn that an invasion could come any day. But an information war between Moscow and the West has been under way for months.
